source_objects.title: Religion & Spirituality
source_objects.description: Learn about new religions, understand your spirituality, and much more.

items.title: Empowering The Empath
items.headline: Master Your Energies
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be ARMED with the tools necessary to ESTABLISH boundaries, feel CONFIDENT in your own skin, and be ENGAGED with the world without it OVERWHELMING you. You will be masterful with your energies understanding, feeling, and sensing how to control the ones flowing through you and around you. You will be able to comprehend and manipulate the flow of life to benefit you and those around you. ​

items.title: Church Growth 101 -Bob Whitesel DMin PhD - Leadership.church

visible_instructors.title: Bob Whitesel D.Min. Ph.D.
visible_instructors.job_title: Award-winning author & teacher for 30+ years w/ 2 doctorates
visible_instructors.name: Bob

items.headline: Easy-to-follow steps & real-life examples of how to apply “The 4 Principles of Church Growth” by a leading authority
objectives_summary: Church Growth Leadership for Staff, Pastors and Volunteers.
Discover the 4 areas of church growth & how to plan for each.
Balance a church's inward & outward focus by discovering needs in the community & matching them to ministries your church can offer.

items.title: Meditation Made Easy by Using Crystals

items.headline: Using Crystals during Meditation to Heal Physical, Mental and Emotional Issues and Deepen Spiritual Connection
objectives_summary: Those who have never experienced meditation before will learn how to meditate.
You will learn how to clear the chatter in your head by focusing on the crystal energy.
You will learn the quick five minute hold mini meditation for those times you need a quick relief.

items.title: Ancient Secrets of Mind & Energy
items.headline: Metaphysical Education; Unfolding Your True Nature
objectives_summary: 3 Part Online Series Reveals Your True Nature, How To Access & Activate Your Innate Powers & How To Implement A Life Of Your Own Design.

*How to manage your mind, emotions and energy more efficiently  *A simple technique that clears your nervous system of all negativity and increases your Life Force Energy  *The fastest way to bring harmonious energy to any situation *Secrets about the Laws of our Existence  *An exact step-by-step guide for Committing To Your Path of personal development, spiritual development, and healthy development of all aspects of your life  *Ancient Esoteric Secret Knowledge of the Ages  *Tons more...!

items.title: An Introduction to Kabbalah for the 21st Century
items.headline: A very basic and modern introductory course that answers 26 simple questions about Kabbalah.
objectives_summary: understand the basic ideas of Kabbalah, its history, its literature, and major concepts. This course is an overview and is aimed at whetting the desire to learn more.

items.title: Meditation Mastery: How To Feel More Presence & Calm

visible_instructors.title: Insider School

visible_instructors.name: Insider

items.headline: Use These 5 Simple & Specific Meditations To Easily Feel More Presence, Calm & Happiness In Your Everyday Life
objectives_summary: 1. By the end of this course, you will have a SOLID understanding of what meditation is (and how to do it)
2. You will KNOW exactly how to effortlessly fit meditation into your everyday life
3. You will start to feel the effects of meditation: greater calm and more peace of mind
